Title: Silverlight VisualBrush alternative
Description: Silverlight 3 doesn't include support for WPF's VisualBrush.  This project demonstrates an alternative technique.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverlight 3 doesn't include support for WPF's VisualBrush. This project demonstrates an alternative technique.

For further details see the related blog post: http://chriscavanagh.wordpress.com/2009/09/24/silverlight-visualbrush-and-rounded-corners/
